Text:
"since Robert Smith never released the
original soundtrack of Carnage Visors, here
it is. Can't wait for the release on CD/DVD."

I guess you don't know about it but Carnage Visors HAS been released on CD. You can find it on the 2CD remastered version of Faith :
http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Faith_%28The_Cure_album%29
amazing track, about 27min.

@leto.
well, then i'm very sorry that i uploaded this file. at least i'm going to buy the cd version, the song is amazing indeed.
